nodes.name: addGrantEntry
editGrantEntry
getGrantEntry

attributes.name: addGrantEntry
editGrantEntry
getGrantEntry

addGrantEntry(uint256[28],uint256,uint25.details: Function to add a new grant entry.

params._class: Class of the grant (0 for Legitimate Transaction, 1 for Fraud Transaction).
params._features: Array of 28 uint256 values representing features V1 to V28.
params._time: Timestamp representing the time of the grant.

editGrantEntry(uint256,uint256[28],uint2.details: Function to edit an existing grant entry.

params._class: Class of the grant (0 for Legitimate Transaction, 1 for Fraud Transaction).
params._features: Array of 28 uint256 values representing features V1 to V28.
params._grantId: ID of the grant entry to be edited.
params._time: Timestamp representing the time of the grant.

getGrantEntry(uint256).details: Function to fetch details of a grant entry by ID.

params._grantId: ID of the grant entry to fetch.

getGrantEntry(uint256).return: features Array of 28 uint256 values representing features V1 to V28.time Timestamp representing the time of the grant.amount Amount of the grant.class Class of the grant (0 for Legitimate Transaction, 1 for Fraud Transaction).
